nodes.title: Revert "Mailer should use its own i18n messages instead of old Jenkins dependency"
Update mailer to use new display-url-api for user facing page links
Mailer should use its own i18n messages instead of old Jenkins dependency
[JENKINS-32301] Support more than one Reply-To Address
Making it buildable with jdk8 and fixed findbugs issues
Fix the encoding issue for the french locale
[FIXED JENKINS-26606] Recipient list tokenizer not including comma delim
New extension point in mailer-plugin exclude email recipients
[JENKINS-19433] - Added handling of user-defined e-mail addresses in FastEmailResolver.
Option to restrict mail to be sent only for failed builds
[FIXED JENKINS-19501] - Added isFast() and additional resolve()
[JENKINS-16437] Link to mail address resolution wiki page
[JENKINS-16390] Introduce new resolution method to be used from UI
Turn off mail address resolution when loading user form
Make seach for user email optional
Fix typo about e-mail for every unstable build
move pipeline job back to test scope
[JENKINS-64629] Fix uncaught exception for unauthorized users
Remove indian word in French email example.
[ignore] Testing re-run of GitHub checks with no write access
Resolve Mailer TODOs & warnings, fixing port data in README
[JENKINS-37655] Use Credentials API for SMTP authentication
[JENKINS-62312] Allow Jenkins.MANAGE user to configure "Jenkins Mailer Plugin"
[JENKINS-2206] - Support connecting to mail servers via TLS
Adding fixes to Message-Id header so that domain override is possible.
Change text in the changelog badge to be more explicit
[JENKINS-58727] Warn only if no build result exists
[JENKINS-59430] Do not reset auth to current value unconditionally
Tests: Fix space in expected log after the bugfix in JCasC 1.30
[JENKINS-59172] - Use GitHub as a source of the plugin's documentation on plugins.jenkins.io
[JENKINS-58768] Fix send test mail after adding JCasC compatibility
Move documentation from Wiki to GitHub
Enable Release Drafter for the repository
Java 11 readiness: build both on JDK8 and JDK11
[JENKINS-55787] Switch labels from entry to checkbox
[JENKINS-55787] Switch from entry to optional block
[JENKINS-37812] No notification re. failed job if agent goes offline during the build
[JENKINS-55099] Location is not loaded by default anymore
Test PR - will be deleted soon
Match wording of the actual checkbox option.
Explicitly log not sending mails if no build result is set + fix some German umlauts apart from Javadoc warnings
Mailer: fix missing getter for smtpHost property
DO NOT MERGE: Is there any way to disable/hide jenkins log generated from mailer plugin.
[JENKINS-41881] Automated test to cover fix for JENKINS-40224
Fixes regression where the correct formatting of mime email messages was lost
[JENKINS-39976] Add line break before separator line even if there are no changesets found
Update mailer to use its own generated Messages i18n
